org.knime.core.node

Class NodeDescription

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.knime.core.node.NodeDescription
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    DelegateNodeDescription, NodeDescription13Proxy, NodeDescription210Proxy, NodeDescription212Proxy, NodeDescription27Proxy, NodeDescription28Proxy, NodeDescription31Proxy, NodeDescriptionXmlProxy, NoDescriptionProxy

    public abstract class NodeDescription
extends Object
    This abstract class describes the meta information about a node. It is used by the NodeFactory. Usually the meta information is read from the XML files which accompany every node factory. But also other means of providing node descriptions are possible.
    Since:
    2.8
    Author:
    Thorsten Meinl, KNIME.com, Zurich, Switzerland

    • Method Detail

      • getIconPath

        public abstract String getIconPath()
        Returns the path to the node's icon. The path should be either absolute (with the root being the root of the classpath) or relative to the node factory's location.
        Returns:
        the path to the node icon, or null if no icon exists
        See Also:
        NodeFactory.getIcon()

      • getInportDescription

        public abstract String getInportDescription(int index)
        Returns a description for an input port.
        Parameters:
        index - the index of the input port, starting at 0
        Returns:
        an input port description or null if no description exists
        See Also:
        NodeFactory.getInportDescription(int)

      • getInportName

        public abstract String getInportName(int index)
        Returns a name for an input port.
        Parameters:
        index - the index of the input port, starting at 0
        Returns:
        an input port name or null if not name is known
        See Also:
        NodeFactory.getInportName(int)

      • getInteractiveViewName

        public abstract String getInteractiveViewName()
        Returns the name of the interactive view if such a view exists. Otherwise null is returned.
        Returns:
        name of the interactive view or null
        See Also:
        NodeFactory.getInteractiveViewName()

      • getNodeName

        public abstract String getNodeName()
        Returns the name of this node.
        Returns:
        the node's name or null if no name is known
        See Also:
        NodeFactory.getNodeName()

      • getOutportDescription

        public abstract String getOutportDescription(int index)
        Returns a description for an output port.
        Parameters:
        index - the index of the output port, starting at 0
        Returns:

      • getViewName

        public abstract String getViewName(int index)
        Returns the name for this node's view at the given index.
        Parameters:
        index - the view index, starting at 0
        Returns:
        the view's name or null if no name is known

      • getXMLDescription

        public abstract Element getXMLDescription()
        The XML description can be used with the NodeFactoryHTMLCreator in order to get a converted HTML description of it, which fits the overall KNIME HTML style.
        Returns:
        XML description of this node

      • stripXmlFragment

        protected static String stripXmlFragment(org.apache.xmlbeans.XmlObject xmlObject)
        Utility function which strips the <xml-fragment> start and end tags from the strings returned by xmlText().
        Parameters:
        xmlObject - an xmlObject whose contents should be serialized into a string
        Returns:
        a string representation of the XML contents

      • setIsDeprecated

        protected void setIsDeprecated(boolean b)
        Flags this node as deprecated node. Subclasses should override this method and modify the XML description accordingly.
        Parameters:
        b - true if this node is node is deprecated, false otherwise
        Since:
        3.0

      • isDeprecated

        public boolean isDeprecated()
        Returns whether the node is deprecated.
        Returns:
        true if the node is deprecated, false otherwise
        Since:
        3.0
